name: selectSubjectData
label: Select Subject Data
description: This module adds a dropdown of all options inputted into a field on the subject level in the specific site (ex. dropdown list of all subject IDs in the site).

fields.name: subjectLevelForm
fields.label: Form name on the subject level
fields.description: The subject level form name where the field is (ex. demographics.form.name.demographics).

fields.name: subjectLevelField
fields.label: Field name on the subject level
fields.description: The field name that you would like to use as options in the dropdown (ex. subject_id).
